data.system_settings: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS, Asus Netbook F551C, Intel Core i3 64bits
data.actual_result: the server will be placed at the position of your mouse cursor, exactly like if you released your mouse here
data.expected_result: The server will be moved back to its initial position in the server list (the sorting action is cancelled)
data.short_description: Pressing ESC while holding a server to sort it doesn't move the server back to its initial position in the server list
data.steps_to_repro: - Grab a server in your server list with your mouse and hold it - Move it up or down to sort it. Do NOT release your mouse yet - While you're still holding it, press ESC
